pages.text: $(l)$(item)Elemental shards$() - are pieces of very fragile crystal that can contain any element.$(br2)They are pretty $(l)common$() in nature just like iron.

pages.title: How to obtain
pages.text: There is several ways to find them!$(li)First way is mining!$(br)They are generating on < Y:40 height and can be mined by a stone pickaxe. $(li)Second way is to find them in the world! Either in dungeon or from trading.
